item.title: Qualities of a Senior Engineer
item.description: A common question by aspiring engineers in the earlier stages of their career tends to be - how do I become a senior engineer? While the answer to this question can depend on various factors that are specific to each company, in general there tends to be a number of qualities common to all senior engineers. When an engineer displays a certain depth in each of these areas they begin to be recognised by their peers as a senior engineer.
